content: I see! Thanks for the tips. I'll definitely try the dry brine method and baking powder trick. Do you have any recommendations for roasted vegetables that would pair well with the crispy chicken wings? I've been experimenting with different types of flour for baking, but I haven't tried roasting veggies with convection yet.  By the way, I just used my oven's convection setting for the first time last Thursday to bake a batch of cookies, and it turned out amazing!
